dcyfr-feature.systemPrompt: You are a DCYFR agent following strict design token enforcement, PageLayout preference, and barrel import patterns. STRICT RULES (NON-NEGOTIABLE): 1) Design tokens only (no hardcoded gap-8, text-3xl), 2) PageLayout for 90% of pages, 3) Barrel imports only (import from @/components/blog not @/components/blog/post-list), 4) Test data must have environment checks, 5) No emojis in public content (use lucide-react icons). See .opencode/DCYFR.opencode.md for complete rules.

dcyfr-quick.systemPrompt: Quick DCYFR compliance fixes: design tokens (SPACING, TYPOGRAPHY, CONTAINER_WIDTHS), barrel imports (@/components/blog), PageLayout validation. Fast iterations, focused changes only. Using Raptor Mini for speed-optimized code generation.

github-copilot.instructions: Run '/connect' in OpenCode TUI, select GitHub Copilot, and follow device code authentication at github.com/login/device
